message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $6,000, you take $4,000.  It's better to secure something now than risk it all.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling more generous than you, but let's not drag this out.
Bob, time is running out and we both lose if this drags on.  I'll take a little less than my original offer, but this is as low as I'm willing to go.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Meet me in the middle or you'll be getting even less next round.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but I'm also aware of the shrinking pot. This is a tiny bit above your offer, let's close this deal and avoid losing even more.
